sub_fields.label: Price
sub_fields.name: package_price
sub_fields.instructions: Please just enter the amount as a number, the £ symbol is already in place.

sub_fields.label: Term
sub_fields.name: price_term
sub_fields.instructions: Select the payment term - either monthly or yearly

sub_fields.label: Feature Included?
sub_fields.name: is_included
sub_fields.instructions: Check box to display a tick, leave unchecked to display a cross

sub_fields.label: Popup Name
sub_fields.name: package_popup_name
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter a name for the popup, this will trigger the modal to open

sub_fields.label: Popup Content
sub_fields.name: popup_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add content for the popup, such as a shortcode to display a form.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: flex_popup_modal_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add your Hubspot form shortcode here.
